A.label: Proven (physiology-grade)
A.description: Stimuli with robust entrainment responses in humans or animals. Claims limited to measurable physiology.

B.label: High-plausibility, low-evidence
B.description: Research prototypes inspired by known mechanisms but lacking direct outcome trials.

presets.label: Gamma 40

visual.precision_note: Exact at 120 Hz refresh; approx at 60 Hz

presets.rationale: 40 Hz auditory steady-state responses are large and reliable biomarkers. Multi-sensory 40 Hz (GENUS) shows microglia/amyloid shifts in AD mouse models; human translation remains early/mixed.
presets.expected: Strong 40 Hz ASSR; potential alertness. No clinical claims.

safety.notes: Keep comfortable volume; caution for 3-60 Hz visual flicker.

presets.label: ASSR 90
presets.rationale: Brainstem-dominant ASSR peaks near 80-95 Hz; excellent for verifying the audio engine and headphone chain.
presets.expected: Rough alerting tone for calibration; not relaxing.

presets.label: Alpha 10 Visual

visual.precision_note: Soft contrast to reduce photosensitivity risk

presets.rationale: Visual alpha entrainment modulates periodic sampling and is reliable in EEG/MEG.
presets.expected: Visual 10 Hz flicker; restful alpha entrainment.

safety.notes: Use soft contrast presets and warn photosensitive users.

presets.label: Theta-Gamma Nest

visual.precision_note: Requires 120 Hz display for exact phase alignment

presets.rationale: External thetaâ†’gamma nesting attempts to bias cross-frequency coupling seen in memory networks.
presets.expected: Strong 40 Hz ASSR plus 6 Hz envelope; subjective focus reports unverified.

safety.notes: Ramp in/out for comfort; research mode only.

presets.label: A/V 40 Phase Study
presets.rationale: Explores phase-steered multi-sensory gamma inspired by mouse GENUS experiments.
presets.expected: Phase-dependent coherence/comfort shifts; for counterbalanced research blocks.

presets.label: Alpha 10 Pre-task
presets.rationale: Alpha-range modulation occasionally reduces acute pain/anxiety; evidence mixed and largely from binaural beats.
presets.expected: Mildly soothing AM audio; exploratory only.

safety.notes: Keep volume low; set expectation that outcomes are uncertain.

presets.label: Slow 0.8 Open-loop
presets.rationale: Open-loop slow bursts mimic closed-loop sleep stimulation but lack phase-locking; offered for practice only.
presets.expected: Gentle noise bursts; not equivalent to lab closed-loop protocols.

safety.notes: Promote low SPL and restful context.

presets.label: Stochastic Resonance Assist
presets.rationale: Adds controlled noise to explore stochastic resonance supporting weak-signal perception.
presets.expected: Improved perception of modulation at lower levels for some listeners; evidence limited.

safety.notes: Keep noise floor low; optional feature disabled by default.
